column3: Howdy, Sir! Welcome to Thistown. I'm Sar Saparilla, the resident.
What can I do for you on this fine day? You lookin' to stay, or just passing through?
..... Just passing through.
Good to hear! After all, Thistown ain't big enough for the both of us.
... on account of the city limits being about 8 square feet!
I'm looking for the deadliest gunslinger around.
Best gunslinger? That'd be RED DEATH KILLER.
I hear he's been hanging out in the city of Tarnation.
What?!? In Tarnation??
Afraid so. I know it's a long way, but there's a trail up north that'll put you on the right track.
..... Fair enough. Thank you, sir.
What's a Sheriff doing in these parts? Come to lock up my good-for-nothing daughter?
Shucks howdy, sher'f!
Miranda!!! Stop shooting so close to the house!
You're going to destroy one of the windows!
Mom you are SO lame. We don't even have windows!
I gotta shoot! There is LITERALLY nothing else to do here.
Come now, Miranda! There's plenty to do here. And Thistown is only like two screens away.
Wait that's it! I'll leave and find somewhere where there's more to do!
Maybe I'll even find a DUEL.
Miranda, DUELs are dangerous!
Sorry Mom, I'm running away!
Howdy, Miranda! What brings you into Thistown?
I'm leaving, Sar. Running away from home.
Leaving? Probably for the best. As they say, Thistown ain't-
Sar, if I have to hear that joke one more time I am going to lose it.
I'm looking for a DUEL. Any leads?
Well, a mysterious Sheriff just passed through here not too long ago.
He was looking for RED DEATH KILLER. Sounds like a DUEL in the making to me.
RED DEATH KILLER, eh? Sounds promising.
They're bound to meet up in Tarnation. Just head north and you'll get there for sure.
Just head north? I can handle that.
Shucks howdy, Mirander!
Please don't shoot me.
Ah, what a wonderful day it is for this boy.
Hey, shuddup. You're not a boy. You're a cow.
WOW. Hurtful.
It's just the facts, if ya don' like em', you can shove 'me up yer-
I'll just have to prove to the world that I'm a real boy.
but you-
An epic adventure to prove my humanity.
*sigh*
Howdy, Steven! You hear about the DUEL happening soon?
A DUEL???
This is the perfect chance to prove I'm a real boy.
Well, the folks involved are headed up north to Tarnation and-
Say no more! I'm on my way!!
Howdy!
Howdy? Shouldn't you be saying things like "Moo"?
Yeesh, talk about a harmful stereotype.
Hear this all who shalt listen!
Tis I, Sir Bennigan! The noble knight in service of the King.
Many treacherous journeys hath I faced on this road I tarry upon...
... yet I feel that I draw close!
Close to what? thine might asketh.
Why prithee ye: a DUEL of course!
Ah! A humble peasant.
Working thine fields for the sake of King and Kingdom, how quaint!
Hey feller I'm gonna need you to get off mah property.
Property! Dost thou a LORD??
Prithee thee!
Uh... yes?
Verily, verily!!
Prithee thee, sir! Dost thou knoweth where I can find a DUEL in these lands?
There's going to be a pretty big DUEL happening in Tarnation soon.
It's the talk of the whole region! Everyone's who's anyone is going to be there.
You should just be able to head north and-
Hark! I've heard enough. I shalt findeth and wineth this DUEL.
For the King!
Welp, here I go, time to find the deadliest gunslinger around.
I can use trusty my arrow keys (or WASD keys) to move around.
And if I need to lasso objects, I've got the Space key for that.
psst... hey... you wanna hear a secret??
uh.... not really.
oh, okay.
psst... hey... you wanna hear a secret??
My mom told me not to talk to strange men!
Especially if they're hiding in a cactus.
oh, okay.
WAIT I JUST REMEMBERED I'M REBELLING CAN YOU TELL ME THE SECRET
nope, too late.
psst... hey... you wanna hear a secret??
uh... sure?
I am in extreme pain.
oh..... cool?
not really
Hark!
yo what, how'd you see me?
Mine eyes doth piece even the shrewdest disguise, for I am a knight!
oh you're a weirdo, okay
A jackalope? I thought these were fake.
A jackalope! I knew these were real.
Mom is going to be so embarrassed when she learns I was right!
If.... I ever see her again....
Howdy feller!
Oh... you don't talk?
What dost this fair creature be??
I'm a Jackalope.
You can lead a horse to water, but you can't make it drink.
I'm not thirsty.
Young girl, have you been practicing your spelling?
Always remember: "i before e, except after c"
Neigh
Want to hear a joke?
I'd love to!
A horse walks into the bar and the bartender aks "Why the long face?"
Gets better every time...
Ah, a fair steed and her noble rider!
Sorry, pal. We're all out of horse jokes.
You should be glad, honestly.
Hey, slick!
What, you're not even going to comment on my Nice Hair?
Hey, nice hair!!
Thank you!! At least SOMEONE understands.
Oh hey, it's a cow!
I'm not a cow, I'm a boy. Take that back!
What are you gonna do about it, make some milk?
Hark thee!
Why are you talking like that?
Darest I say I know not what thy mean?
Is that supposed to be Old English? You're not even doing it right.
Taketh that back! I shalt say again: take it back!
Dude, stop. You're being a huge nerd.
You're a rascal! You're a rascal with no respect for knights!!
(finally, someone who can match my pace of conversation)
Hey, are you a mime?
Uh, hate to break it to you but this is a *mine*. With an "n."
This must be so embarassing for you....
Hmm... you're all black and white.
Are you a cow???
Hark ye, man of hat and paint!
Ah, a man of silence. Are thee a monk perhaps?
Dude, c'mon. You're making us actors look bad.
I know not what ye meaneth? What is an "actor"?
Oh no. He's actually just insane.
Oh yeah, just remembered.
I can use my R key to restart a room, in case I need that.
Might come in handy if there are any puzzles up ahead.
*sigh*... I sure hope there aren't too many puzzles.
The town of Oasis... Halfway between Thistown and Tarnation.
It's pretty lush here, at least for the desert.
Ah, the Mines of Danger.
Once I get through these, I should finally make it to Tarnation.
I've got to find the deadliest gunslinger...
Alright! Some puzzles!
I can use R to restrart a room or I can use ctrl + R to restart this entire area.
I am within the earth.
.... okay?
It's comfy.
I'm Moleman.
What is it? Are you a mole? Or are you a man?
I'm Moleman.
Mmm... I found some nice loam today.
Uh... that's gross, dude.
What would you prefer? Clay? Silt? Sand?
uh...
Sandy clay? Clay loam? Silty clay loam? Loamy Sand?
Great Gatsbies! A severed head!
No, I'm Moleman.
My body is in the earth.
Welcome to my mines! I'm the foreman, I call the shots around here.
Shots??
Uh... please refrain from actually shooting anything though.
There's some delicate machinery here.
I'm being rebelious today, so no promises!
Welcome to the mines! I'm the foreman. You looking for a job?
Just passing through...
Oh come on, we could use a strong man like yourself down here!
Or anyone sane really, my only employee likes to eat dirt.
Welcome to the mines! I'm the foreman. You looking for a job?
You'd consider me for a job???
Sure! We could tie a harness to you and have you march around to power this here machinery.
What, like some kind of animal?
Welcome to the mines! I'm the foreman. You looking for a job?
Nay- no job for I, for I am already employed, in service of the king!!
Yeah actually I take back my offer anyway...
